title: Control Line - means a line on either side of a highway or part of highway beyond the building line fixed in respect of such highway by the Highway Authority from time to time
clause_text: Control Line - means a line on either side of a highway or part of highway beyond the building line fixed in respect of such highway by the Highway Authority from time to time.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
